name: mosaics
notes:
experience level: advanced beginner.
language & terminology: english (us), deutsch,  español, français, nederlands, suomeksi, italiano.
technique: overlay mosaic crochet in the round from center out. 
pattern repeat: 14 rs.
pattern file size: 9 pages.

the pattern includes:
•	detailed introductory information about mosaic crochet basics and links to video tutorials (a separate file);
•	chart with marked xs;
•	written blanket pattern;
•	border pattern;
•	pattern layout;
•	[video tutorial][1] overlay mosaic crochet in the round from center out basics.

yarn, hook & approximate size: 
the mosaics pattern sample was created using the following yarn:

yarn weight #3 (light/dk)
hook size clover amour, 4.5 mm
yarn	
color a: hobbii mega ball, white (01) 
color b: hobbii manaya, color (02) 
note: hobbii manaya is marked as medium/aran weight yarn, but it’s more likely light/dk weight

sample size, shape & amount of yarn 	
square. 79 cm/31.1” from side to side including a border
color a: 204 g, 612 m / 670 yds
color b: 183 g, 467 m / 511 yds
border in color b 27 g, 70 m / 77 yds

you can use any yarn, colors & appropriate hook size that suits your project. 

original design and the technique of how to start/end every round created by daiga talentiene, bebablanket designer
june, 2022 

the pattern was tested by: tania leis, judy leacock, carol brunquell sutcliffe, mirjam annaars, rita miller.

translators:
dutch: mirjam annaars
german: heidrun liegmann
spanish: elizabeth pintado-díaz, lynda hernández and teresa sánchez
french: johanne rousseau, katherine martinet
finnish: jutta heisalo
italian: sabrina milani, debora fior

corrections and edits: 
february 8, 2023. corrected german version.
april 8, 2023 added french translation
may 2, 2023. added finnish translation
august 21, 2023. added italian translation

  [1]: https://youtu.be/lugsjamitxw
